Proceed through these pages to learn to use Legacy Launcher

These are the names Legacy Launcher uses for the corresponding visual interface elements:

A) Desktop
configurable workspace containing common items

B) Icons

C) Widgets

D) Dock
can be configured to display 1/3/5 icons. Contents of the center dock are locked by default, but this can be changed in \'Launcher Setup\'.

E) Application Tray
drawer, grid of installed applications

A) To add icons/widgets to the desktop, perform a long-press on an empty grid space on the desktop

B) You may also add icons/widgets by pressing the \'Menu\' button→\'Add\' item as shown.

C) After a widget has been selected, choose a size for the new widget. If there is insufficient room on the desktop, the new widget will not appear on the desktop.

D) To resize a widget after it has been added, perform a long-press on the widget itself→\'Resize\' from the popup menu. Then drag the arrows to resize the widget, and finish by pressing the \'Back\' button.

Add or remove desktop screens: \'Menu\'→\'Edit Desktop\'. Number of screens selectable is between 1 to 7. When finished editing, press \'Back\' to return to the desktop:

A) Add desktop screen

B) Remove desktop screen

C) Swap desktop screens left/right

D) Set default desktop screen
"Go to \'Launcher Setup\' to make further changes to your configuration. To get there, press the \'Menu\' button from the desktop."

"The look-and-feel of the launcher can be changed by installing compatible themes.

A) Select \'Themes\' from \'Launcher Setup\'.

B) The easiest way to get more themes is via the Google Play Store.

To apply dock backgrounds, please make sure that the dock background has not been hidden in the settings. "

A) When finished with \'Launcher Setup\' and desktop layout, prevent unwanted changes to the desktop by applying the lock function. Press the \'Menu\' button from the desktop→\'Lock\'.

B) Choose \'Unlock\' when locked to unlock.

C) Also access the lock function with \'Launcher Setup\'→\'Launcher Lock\'.


D)Passwords can be set in \'Launcher Setup\'.
If you have forgotten your password, you can clear all data for Legacy Launcher. This can typically be done by entering \'Settings\' from the desktop→\'Settings\'→
\'Applications\'→\'Manage applications\'→
\'Legacy Launcher\'→\'Clear data\'.

You can backup or restore options by accessing the \'Backup and restore\' preference found in \'Legacy Launcher Setup\' as shown.


This is the end of the guide. You can access this again from \'Launcher Setup\'→\ User Guide\'.
